title: Dancing Girls Taking Jinrikisha, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LRC, in the negative: [B. 1167 2 DA
description: two young women wearing traditional Japanese costumes and carrying parasols; standing woman at left wears pale green kimono with pink, yellow and light blue flowers; woman at center in lavender and green kimono is seated in a rickshaw; rickshaw driver at right holding wheel of rickshaw, dressed in black
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
